remarks: The closure is closed under axiom application.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mclsval.d $e |- D = ( mDV ` T ) $.
mclsval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mclsval.c $e |- C = ( mCls ` T ) $.
mclsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> T e. mFS ) $.
mclsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> K C_ D ) $.
mclsval.3 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ E ) $.
mclsax.a $e |- A = ( mAx ` T ) $.
mclsax.l $e |- L = ( mSubst ` T ) $.
mclsax.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mclsax.h $e |- H = ( mVH ` T ) $.
mclsax.w $e |- W = ( mVars ` T ) $.
mclsax.4 $e |- ( ph -> <. M , O , P >. e. A ) $.
mclsax.5 $e |- ( ph -> S e. ran L ) $.
mclsax.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. O ) -> ( S ` x ) e. ( K C B ) ) $.
mclsax.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ v e. V ) -> ( S ` ( H ` v ) ) e. ( K C B ) ) $.
mclsax.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x M y /\ a e. ( W ` ( S ` ( H ` x ) ) ) /\ b e. ( W ` ( S ` ( H ` y ) ) ) ) ) -> a K b ) $.
mclsax $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` P ) e. ( K C B ) ) $.
$d B v x y $.
$d C v x $.
$d E v $.
$d H a b v x $.
$d K a b v x y $.
$d L x y $.
$d M a b x y $.
$d O x y $.
$d P x y $.
$d S a b v x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d V v x $.
$d W a b x $.
$d a b ph v x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
